name: DesktopDoggo
description:
Best dog of the year award goes to...

A free play virtual pet simulator featuring Doggo! This might get updated but probably not.  

Q&A

Q. What is  Desktop Doggo? A. A virtual pet that you can play, work, eat, and exercise with!

Q. Whats the point? A. There is none have fun with him!

Q. Is this game mobile friendly?  A. You could run it on mobile but I don't recommend it.

Why is this here?

Idk
